SELECT DISTINCT planelement.defaulttext AS defaulttext, planelement.organizational_commentary AS comment, term_year, term_segment, term_type.defaulttext,unit.elementnr as elementnr FROM planelement, unit, term_type WHERE planelement.unit_id=unit.id AND planelement.term_type_id = term_type.id and elementnr in ([elementnr]) GROUP BY planelement.defaulttext,planelement.organizational_commentary, unit.elementnr, term_year, term_segment, term_type.defaulttext
SELECT DISTINCT person.firstname, person.surname, student.registrationnumber FROM hisinone.examplan JOIN hisinone.person ON (examplan.person_id=person.id) LEFT JOIN hisinone.academicdegree on (person.academicdegree_id = academicdegree.id) LEFT JOIN hisinone.k_remark_on_exam ON (k_remark_on_exam.id=examplan.k_remark_on_exam_id) LEFT JOIN hisinone.examrelation ON (examrelation.id = examplan.default_examrelation_id) LEFT JOIN hisinone.examresult ON (examresult.examrelation_id = examrelation.id) LEFT JOIN hisinone.k_workstatus ON (k_workstatus.id = examrelation.k_workstatus_id) JOIN hisinone.planelement ON (examplan.planelement_id=planelement.id), hisinone.student WHERE person.id=student.person_id AND examplan.id IN ([where.examplanid]) ORDER BY person.surname, person.firstname;
